## Description {#details}

Wrapper encapsulating separate constraint systems and corresponding value mappings for both unsigned and signed information.

Facts are added to and conditions are checked against the corresponding system depending on the signed-ness of their predicates. While the information is kept separate based on signed-ness, certain conditions can be transferred between the two systems.

Definition at line 267 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/constraintelimination-cpp">ConstraintElimination.cpp</a>.

### getConstraint() {#a085e72b5a3ed050deb15aa57090c54ba}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ConstraintTy ConstraintInfo::getConstraint (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b">CmpInst::Predicate</a> Pred, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Op0, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Op1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; NewVariables, bool ForceSignedSystem=false) const</>}>
Turn a comparison of the form <code>Op0</code> <code>Pred</code> <code>Op1</code> into a vector of constraints, using indices from the corresponding constraint system.

New variables that need to be added to the system are collected in <code>NewVariables</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/constraintelimination-cpp/#l00315">315</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/constraintelimination-cpp">ConstraintElimination.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getConstraintForSolving() {#a8e787163c914dba0f28ef79e92c9768b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ConstraintTy ConstraintInfo::getConstraintForSolving (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b">CmpInst::Predicate</a> Pred, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Op0, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Op1) const</>}>
Turns a comparison of the form <code>Op0</code> <code>Pred</code> <code>Op1</code> into a vector of constraints using getConstraint.

Returns an empty constraint if the result cannot be used to query the existing constraint system, e.g. because it would require adding new variables. Also tries to convert signed predicates to unsigned ones if possible to allow using the unsigned system which increases the effectiveness of the signed &lt;-&gt; unsigned transfer logic.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/constraintelimination-cpp/#l00326">326</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/constraintelimination-cpp">ConstraintElimination.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Adds facts into constraint system.

<code>ForceSignedSystem</code> can be set when the <code>Pred</code> is eq/ne, and signed constraint system is used when it&#39;s specified.
